text: Listen to thoses cheesy 90s synths. This game was way too hard for its own good, but I still have fond memories of renting it. With Jurassic Park being one my favorite movies of all time, it's pretty sad that I still haven't got any motivation to watch Fallen Kingdom. They really dropped the ball there.

text: The books are my favorite and the movies are really fun (beside 3 and the fallen kingdom). The books are more on the science and theories of recreating dinosaurs. But it's also as action packed like one chapter in the book had a person shooting a rocket launcher at a raptor and blowing it's leg off.

text: Really, only watch the opening of Fallen Kingdom. It's like taking the things that made Jurassic Park scary and making them even better. Other than that, the movie just sucks.
